issues.description: The problem statement text specifies that calculateTotalPrice must be static, but the UML diagram does not indicate this (no underlined static notation). This contradiction may confuse students as to whether calculateTotalPrice should be a static or instance method.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the UML diagram with the textual requirement by underlining calculateTotalPrice (and other static methods/attributes) to indicate they are static, or remove the text requiring it to be static to match the UML.

issues.description: In the solution implementation, calculateTotalPrice is declared as an instance method, but the problem specification explicitly requires it to be static. This inconsistency means the solution does not fulfill the stated design.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the signature in SealSaloon.java to 'public static int calculateTotalPrice(Meal meal)' so it matches the static requirement in the problem statement.
